## Description {#details}

Instrumentation based profiling lowering pass.

This pass lowers the profile instrumented code generated by FE or the IR based instrumentation pass.

Definition at line 25 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/instrumentation/instrprofiling-h">InstrProfiling.h</a>.
